anya-e0105n2:2: (Ka) “buddhaghoso ‘brāhmaṇakulajāto’ti na sakkā gahetuṁ. Kasmā vedakālato paṭṭhāya yāvajjatanā sabbepi brāhmaṇā
anya-e0105n2:4: Ūrū tadasya yada vagya?, Padbhyāṁ gūdro ajāyatā”ti iruveda, 10-maṇḍala, 90; tathā athava 6 veda 19, 6, 6.
anya-e0105n2:5: Imaṁ purisasuttaṁ nāma mantaṁ jānantīti saddahiyā.
anya-e0105n2:6: Ayaṁ panassā attho – ‘brāhmaṇo assa (brahmuno) mukhaṁ āsi. Bāhū rājañño kato, khattiyā assa bāhūti vuttaṁ hoti. Yo vesso, so assa ūrū. Suddo assa pādehi ajāyī’ti.
anya-e0105n2:7_0: Buddhaghoso pana ‘paṇḍitabrāhmaṇo’ti ñātopi taṁ gāthaṁ na aññāsi. Tathā hi tena bandhupādāpaccāti
anya-e0105n2:7_1: padassa atthavaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘tesaṁ kira ayaṁ laddhi – brāhmaṇā brahmuno mukhato nikkhantā,
anya-e0105n2:7_2: khattiyā urato, vessā nābhito, suddā jāṇuto, samaṇā piṭṭhipādato’ti dī. ni. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n2:7_3: 1.263; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.508 tissā vedagāthāya asamānattho vaṇṇito”ti.
anya-e0105n2:8_0: Ayaṁ panettha anuvicāraṇā – yadi ca taṁkālikānampi brāhmaṇānaṁ laddhi tatheva bhaveyya
anya-e0105n2:8_1: yathā etissaṁ gāthāyaṁ vuttā, sā catthavaṇṇanā ācariyassa matimattā. Evaṁ sati sā
anya-e0105n2:8_2: vicāraṇā yuttā bhaveyya. Etissaṁ pana gāthāyaṁ “brāhmaṇosya mukhamāsīdi”ti paṭhamapādena
anya-e0105n2:8_3: “brāhmaṇā brahmuno mukhato jātā”ti attho ujukato na labbhati. Buddhakāle pana brāhmaṇānaṁ
anya-e0105n2:8_4: laddhi “brāhmaṇā brahmuno mukhato jātā”ti evameva ahosīti pākaṭoyevāyamattho. Tathā
anya-e0105n2:9_0: “Dissanti kho pana vāseṭṭha brāhmaṇānaṁ brāhmaṇiyo utuniyopi gabbhiniyopi vijāyamānāpi
anya-e0105n2:9_1: pāyamānāpi. Te ca brāhmaṇā 0 yonijāva samānā evamāhaṁsu – brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇo,
anya-e0105n2:9_2: hīnā aññe vaṇṇā. Brāhmaṇova sukko vaṇṇo, kaṇhā aññe vaṇṇā. Brāhmaṇāva sujjhanti,
anya-e0105n2:9_3: no abrāhmaṇā. Brāhmaṇāva brahmuno puttā orasā mukhato jātā brahmajā brahmanimmitā
anya-e0105n2:9_4: brahmadāyādāti. Te brahmānañceva abbhācikkhanti, musā ca bhāsanti, bahuñca apuññaṁ pasavantī”ti –
anya-e0105n2:10_0: Bhagavatā mahākāruṇikena vāseṭṭhabhāradvājānaṁ brāhmaṇamāṇavakānaṁ bhāsitaṁ, tehi
anya-e0105n2:10_1: ca taṁ abhinanditaṁ. Te pana dvepi māṇavakā jātivasena parisuddhabrāhmaṇā ceva honti
anya-e0105n2:10_2: tiṇṇampi vedānaṁ pāraguno ca. Tasmā “brāhmaṇā brahmuno mukhato nikkhantā”ti vacanassa
anya-e0105n2:10_3: taṁkālikānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ laddhivasena vuttabhāvo pākaṭoyeva. Yathā cetaṁ, evaṁ “khattiyā
anya-e0105n2:10_4: urato, vessā nābhito, suddā jāṇuto, samaṇā piṭṭhipādato”ti vacanampi “taṁkālikabrāhmaṇānaṁ
anya-e0105n2:10_5: laddhiññūhi porāṇaṭṭhakathācariyehi vutta”nti saddahitvā ācariyabuddhaghosena taṁ
anya-e0105n2:10_6: sabbaṁ porāṇaṭṭhakathāto bhāsāparivattanamattena visesetvā pakāsitaṁ bhaveyya. Tasmā
anya-e0105n2:11: (Kha) punapi tena ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa abrāhmaṇabhāvasādhanatthaṁ dutiyampi kāraṇaṁ evamāhaṭaṁ –
anya-e0105n2:12_1: iti dissati. Māgaṇḍiyasutte bhariyāya methunasaṁvāsābhāvena uppajjanārahagabbhassa
anya-e0105n2:12_2: nāsakattaṁ sandhāya māgaṇḍiyo paribbājako bhagavantaṁ ‘bhūnahu (bhūnahano) samaṇo
anya-e0105n2:12_3: gotamo’ti ma. ni. 2.207 ādayo āha. Taṁ buddhaghoso na jānātīti pākaṭoyeva tadatthasaṁvaṇṇanāya.
anya-e0105n2:12_4: Tattha hi tena bhūnahunoti (bhūnahanassā) padaṁ ‘hatavaḍḍhino mariyādakārakassā’ti
anya-e0105n2:13_0: Tampi ayuttameva. Na hi māgaṇḍiyena phoṭṭhabbārammaṇāparibhogamattameva sandhāya
anya-e0105n2:13_1: bhūnahubhāvo vutto, atha kho channampi lokāmisārammaṇānaṁ aparibhogaṁ sandhāya vutto. Tasmiñhi sutte –
anya-e0105n2:14_0: “Cakkhuṁ kho māgaṇḍiya rūpārāmaṁ rūparataṁ rūpasammuditaṁ, taṁ tathāgatassa dantaṁ
anya-e0105n2:14_1: guttaṁ rakkhitaṁ saṁvutaṁ, tassa ca saṁvarāya dhammaṁ deseti, idaṁ nu te etaṁ māgaṇḍiya
anya-e0105n2:14_2: sandhāya bhāsitaṁ ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti. Etadeva kho pana me bho gotama sandhāya
anya-e0105n2:14_3: bhāsitaṁ ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti. Taṁ kissa hetu, evañhi no sutte ocaratīti…pe…
anya-e0105n2:14_4: mano kho māgaṇḍiya dhammārāmo dhammarato dhammasammudito, so tathāgatassa danto gutto
anya-e0105n2:14_5: rakkhito saṁvuto, tassa ca saṁvarāya dhammaṁ deseti, idaṁ nu te etaṁ māgaṇḍiya sandhāya
anya-e0105n2:14_6: bhāsitaṁ ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti. Etadeva kho pana me bho gotama sandhāya bhāsitaṁ
anya-e0105n2:14_7: ‘bhūnahu samaṇo gotamo’ti. Taṁ kissa hetu, evañhi no sutte ocaratī”ti ma. ni. 2.207 ādayo.
anya-e0105n2:15: Evaṁ bhagavato ca anuyogo māgaṇḍiyassa ca paṭiññā āgatā.
anya-e0105n2:16_0: Ettha hi methunappaṭisevanavasena phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaparibhogahetu eva gabbhapatiṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0105n2:16_1: sambhavatīti tadaparibhogameva sandhāya “bhūnahū”ti vattuṁ arahati, tadaññesaṁ pana
anya-e0105n2:16_2: pañcannaṁ rūpādiārammaṇānaṁ, tatthāpi visesato dhammārammaṇassa suddhamanoviññāṇena
anya-e0105n2:16_3: paribhogahetu natthi kiñci gabbhapatiṭṭhānanti tesaṁ aparibhogaṁ sandhāya bhūnahūti
anya-e0105n2:16_4: vattuṁ na arahatiyeva, māgaṇḍiyena pana sabbānipi tāni sandhāya vuttabhāvo paṭiññāto,
anya-e0105n2:16_5: kāraṇañcassa dassitaṁ “evañhi no sutte ocaratī”ti. Tasmā kiñcāpi dāni brāhmaṇaganthesu
anya-e0105n2:16_6: bhūnahu- (bhrūnahā) saddo gabbhaghātanatthe dissati, māgaṇḍiyasutte paneso attho
anya-e0105n2:16_7: na yujjatīti ācariyena “hatavaḍḍhi mariyādakārako”ti ayamevattho porāṇaṭṭhakathāya
anya-e0105n2:17_1: so hi visuddhimagge sīlaniddese (1, 31) brāhmaṇānaṁ parihāsaṁ karonto ‘evaṁ iminā
anya-e0105n2:17_2: piṇḍapātapaṭisevanena purāṇañca jighacchāvedanaṁ paṭihaṅkhāmi, navañca vedanaṁ aparimitabhojanapaccayaṁ
anya-e0105n2:17_3: āharahatthaka alaṁsāṭaka tatravaṭṭaka kākamāsaka bhuttavamitakabrāhmaṇānaṁ aññataro
anya-e0105n2:17_4: viya na uppādessāmīti paṭisevatī’ti āha. Idaṁ pana ekassa bhinnabrāhmaṇaladdhikassāpi
anya-e0105n2:17_5: vacanaṁ siyāti tadeva daḷhakāraṇaṁ katvā na sakkā ‘buddhaghoso abrāhmaṇo’ti vattu”nti
anya-e0105n2:17_6: tatiyaṁ kāraṇaṁ vuttaṁ. Taṁ pana atisaṁvejanīyavacanameva. Na hetaṁ ācariyena brāhmaṇānaṁ
anya-e0105n2:17_7: parihāsaṁ kātukāmena vuttaṁ, na ca taṁ parihāsavacanena saṁyojetabbaṭṭhānaṁ, aññadatthu
anya-e0105n2:17_9: tathāyeva ca ācariyena vuttaṁ. Tathā hi ye loke paradattūpajīvino samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā
anya-e0105n2:17_10: vā aññe vāpi ca puggalā, te paccavekkhaṇañāṇarahitā asaṁvare ṭhitā kadāci atipaṇītaṁ
anya-e0105n2:17_11: rasaṁ pahūtaṁ laddhā aparimitampi bhuñjeyyuṁ, visesato pana brāhmaṇā lokikavatthuvasena
anya-e0105n2:17_12: ca, jātakādisāsanikavatthuvasena ca tādisā ahesunti pākaṭā. Imasmiñhi loke vassasatasahassehi
anya-e0105n2:17_13: vā vassakoṭīhi vā aparicchinnaddhāne ko sakkā vattuṁ “nedisā bhūtapubbā”ti. Tasmā
anya-e0105n2:17_14: tādisehi viya na aparimitabhojanehi bhavitabbanti ovādānusāsanidānavaseneva vuttaṁ.
anya-e0105n2:17_15: Tadevaṁ atthasaṁhitampi samānaṁ ayonisomanasikaroto anatthameva jātaṁ, yathā sabhariyassa
anya-e0105n2:17_16: māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇassa anāgāmimaggaphalatthāyapi desitā gāthā dha. pa. aṭṭha. 1.sāmāvatīvatthu
anya-e0105n2:17_17: tesaṁ dhītuyā anatthāya saṁvattatīti saṁvegoyevettha brūhetabboti.
